Issue.creator: mbwhite
Issue.summary: Cannot read property namespace of undefined on chaincode node builds
Issue.description: DEBU 0a5 ESCC invoke result: response:}} (reference https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-chaincode-node-verify-x86_64/253/console.log.gz) The tests that trigger this seems to be either let iterator = await stub.getStateByRange('key2', 'key6'); or let iterator = await stub.getStateByPartialCompositeKey('color~name', 'blue' ); Assuming that this message is being sent wrongly {{// KV -- QueryResult for range/execute query. Holds a key and corresponding value. message KV { string namespace = 1; string key = 2; bytes value = 3; } }} >
